openaiSpec.name: mboum_options_data
openaiSpec.description: Access MBOUM's options data API for detailed information on stock options, including option chains, expiration dates, strike prices, and options analytics. Use this plugin when you need specific information about options trading rather than general stock data.

requestDetails.description: An object containing the target Mboum options data endpoint and its specific parameters.

endpoint.description: The specific Mboum API endpoint for options data. Select the most appropriate endpoint based on the user's request.

queryParams.description: Parameters required for the selected endpoint. Different endpoints need different parameters.

date.description: Expiration date in YYYY-MM-DD format (required for 'options' and 'options_chain' endpoints).

strike.description: Strike price for specific option (optional for 'options_chain' endpoint).

greeks.description: Include Greeks calculations in the response (optional for 'options' endpoint).

allExpDates.description: Return all expiration dates (optional for 'options_expiration_dates' endpoint).
